column5: I'm interested in doing some ice fishing this winter on the Bay of Quinte and could use some help choosing an outfitter. I'm looking for a good price over a weekend (plus a day or two), good customer service, pros - cons,  etc...  Any help would be appreciated.
Here's a list you can start with.  Ontario Out of Doors Ice Hut Operators List
you could Check these guys out  http://www.g2angling.com/   Jamie ( Stoty )  is a nice guy. Haven't met the other guys on G2.

I'd also recommend Stoty. They have been on good fish this winter.  I would assume it would be a choice on what you want with them too. As in:  Do you want numbers or do you want trophies. Sometimes they are not in the same places. I'm sure they will steer you right.  Cheers, Ron...
Stoty has steered me in the right direction from this OFC board.Very helpful.
